title: Documentary Recalls The Talented, Difficult Life Of Bing Crosby
teaser: Bing Crosby has long been the voice of the Christmas season, and now he's the subject of a new American Masters documentary. NPR's Scott Simon talks to Kathryn and Mary Crosby about his legacy.
